The '''Liyue Shrine of Depths Key''' is an Adventure Item which can be used to unlock the [[Shrines of Depths]] in [[Liyue]], allowing players to access the [[chests]] inside. Keys do not correspond to specific shrines, meaning any key can be used to unlock any shrine in Liyue.

10 Liyue Shrine of Depths Keys are obtainable, allowing the player to open every shrine in Liyue.

==How to Obtain==
===Domains===
*[[Domain of Forsaken Ruins]]
*[[Domain of the Wayward Path]]
*[[Hidden Palace of Guizang Formula]]
**Gives 2 keys. One for the "[[Voyage to the Sanguine Sky]]" level and another for the "[[Travels of the Moonlit Venturer]]" level.

===Quests===
*[[The Chi of Yore]]
*[[The Tree who Stands Alone]]
*[[Treasure Lost, Treasure Found (Part 2)]]
*[[Adventure Rank Ascension 2]] (Awards 3 Keys)
